member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetPropertyCount
member.summary: Gets the number of top-level properties.
member.returns: This method returns the number of custom (non-system) properties that can be accessed by the object.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetPropertyIndex
member.summary: Gets the index corresponding to the given property name.
member.param: The name of the property to retrieve.
member.returns: The index of the corresponding property name.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetPropertyName
member.summary: Gets the property name that corresponds to the given index.
member.param: The index of the property for which the name is being returned.
When this method returns, contains the name being retrieved.
The number of characters in the name buffer.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The supplied buffer was too small to accommodate the data.
The specified property does not exist.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetPropertyName
member.summary: Gets the property name that corresponds to the given index. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the property for which the name is being returned.
When this method returns, contains the name being retrieved.
The number of characters in the name buffer.
member.returns:
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
HRESULT Description
S_OK No error occurred.
HRESULT_FROM_WIN32(ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER) The supplied buffer was too small to accommodate the data.
D2DERR_INVALID_PROPERTY The specified property does not exist.
�

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetPropertyNameLength
member.summary: Gets the number of characters for the given property name. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the property name to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns the size in characters of the name corresponding to the given property index, or zero if the property index does not exist.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetPropertyNameLength
member.summary: Gets the number of characters for the given property name.
member.param: The index of the property name to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns the size in characters of the name corresponding to the given property index, or zero if the property index does not exist.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetSubProperties
member.summary: Gets the sub-properties of the provided property by index.
member.param: The index of the sub-properties to be retrieved.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the sub-properties.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified property does not exist.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetSubProperties
member.summary: Gets the sub-properties of the provided property by index. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the sub-properties to be retrieved.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the sub-properties.
member.returns:
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
HRESULT Description
S_OK No error occurred.
D2DERR_NO_SUBPROPERTIES The specified property does not exist.
�

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetType

summary.para: Gets the of the selected property.
This is a template overload. See Remarks.

member.param: The index of the property for which the type will be retrieved.
member.returns: This method returns a -typed value for the type of the selected property.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetType
member.summary: Gets the of the selected property.
member.param: The index of the property for which the type will be retrieved.
member.returns: This method returns a -typed value for the type of the selected property.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the property by index. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the property from which the value is to be obtained.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified property by index.
member.param: The index of the property from which the data is to be obtained.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the data requested.
The number of bytes in the data to be retrieved.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified property does not exist.
Failed to allocate required video memory.
One or more arguments are invalid.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified property by index.
member.param: The index of the property from which the data is to be obtained.
TBD
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the data requested.
The number of bytes in the data to be retrieved.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified property does not exist.
Failed to allocate required video memory.
One or more arguments are invalid.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified property by index. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the property from which the data is to be obtained.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the data requested.
The number of bytes in the data to be retrieved.
member.returns:
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
HRESULT Description
S_OK No error occurred.
D2DERR_INVALID_PROPERTY The specified property does not exist.
E_OUTOFMEMORY Failed to allocate necessary memory.
D3DERR_OUT_OF_VIDEO_MEMORY Failed to allocate required video memory.
E_INVALIDARG One or more arguments are invalid.
E_FAIL Unspecified failure.
�

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the property by index. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the property from which the value is to be obtained.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the value.
member.returns:
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
HRESULT Description
S_OK No error occurred.
D2DERR_INVALID_PROPERTY The specified property does not exist.
E_OUTOFMEMORY Failed to allocate necessary memory.
D3DERR_OUT_OF_VIDEO_MEMORY Failed to allocate required video memory.
E_INVALIDARG One or more arguments are invalid.
E_FAIL Unspecified failure.
�

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValueByName
member.summary: Gets the property value by name. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The property name to get.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValueByName
member.summary: Gets the property value by name.
member.param: The property name to get.
When this method returns, contains the buffer with the data value.
The number of bytes in the data to be retrieved.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified property does not exist.
Failed to allocate required video memory.
One or more arguments are invalid.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValueByName
member.summary: Gets the property value by name.
member.param: The property name to get.
TBD
When this method returns, contains the buffer with the data value.
The number of bytes in the data to be retrieved.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified property does not exist.
Failed to allocate required video memory.
One or more arguments are invalid.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValueByName
member.summary: Gets the property value by name. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The property name to get.
When this method returns, contains the value.
member.returns:
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
HRESULT Description
S_OK No error occurred.
D2DERR_INVALID_PROPERTY The specified property does not exist.
E_OUTOFMEMORY Failed to allocate necessary memory.
D3DERR_OUT_OF_VIDEO_MEMORY Failed to allocate required video memory.
E_INVALIDARG One or more arguments are invalid.
E_FAIL Unspecified failure.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValueSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the property value in bytes, using the property index. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The index of the property.
member.returns: This method returns size of the value in bytes, using the property index

member.name: ID2D1Properties.GetValueSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the property value in bytes, using the property index.
member.param: The index of the property.
member.returns: This method returns size of the value in bytes, using the property index

member.name: ID2D1Properties.SetValueByName
member.summary: Sets the named property to the given value.

listheader.description: The specified property does not exist.

member.name: ID2D1Properties.SetValueByName
member.summary: Sets the named property to the given value. This is a template overload. See Remarks.
member.param: The name of the property to set.
The data to set. The method will convert this type to a BYTE* before setting it as the property value.
member.returns:
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
HRESULT Description
S_OK No error occurred.
D2DERR_INVALID_PROPERTY The specified property does not exist.
E_OUTOFMEMORY Failed to allocate necessary memory.
D3DERR_OUT_OF_VIDEO_MEMORY Failed to allocate required video memory.
E_INVALIDARG One or more arguments are invalid.

member.name: ID2D1Properties
member.summary: Represents a set of run-time bindable and discoverable properties that allow a data-driven application to modify the state of a Direct2D effect.
